title: Carleman Linearization of Partial Differential Equations
abstract:
Carleman linearization is a technique that embeds systems of ordinary
differential equations with polynomial nonlinearities into infinite dimensional
linear systems in a procedural way. In this paper we generalize the method for
systems of partial differential equations with quadratic nonlinearities, while
maintaining the original structure of Carleman linearization. Furthermore, we
apply our approach to Burger's equation and to the Vlasov equation as examples.
